# 缓存服务[¶](#api-cache "永久链接至标题")

缓存服务 (Cache) 可以为您提供高性能的缓存集群，目前支持 Redis 和 Memcached 两种缓存。

*   [DescribeCaches](describe_caches.html)
*   [CreateCache](create_cache.html)
*   [StopCaches](stop_caches.html)
*   [StartCaches](start_caches.html)
*   [RestartCaches](restart_caches.html)
*   [DeleteCaches](delete_caches.html)
*   [ResizeCaches](resize_cache.html)
*   [UpdateCache](update_cache.html)
*   [ChangeCacheVxnet](change_cache_vxnet.html)
*   [ModifyCacheAttributes](modify_cache_attributes.html)
*   [DescribeCacheNodes](describe_cache_nodes.html)
*   [AddCacheNodes](add_cache_nodes.html)
*   [DeleteCacheNodes](delete_cache_nodes.html)
*   [RestartCacheNodes](restart_cache_nodes.html)
*   [ModifyCacheNodeAttributes](modify_cache_node_attributes.html)
*   [CreateCacheFromSnapshot](create_cache_from_snapshot.html)
*   [DescribeCacheParameterGroups](describe_cache_parameter_groups.html)
*   [CreateCacheParameterGroup](create_cache_parameter_group.html)
*   [ApplyCacheParameterGroup](apply_cache_parameter_group.html)
*   [DeleteCacheParameterGroups](delete_cache_parameter_groups.html)
*   [ModifyCacheParameterGroupAttributes](modify_cache_parameter_group_attributes.html)
*   [DescribeCacheParameters](describe_cache_parameters.html)
*   [UpdateCacheParameters](update_cache_parameters.html)
*   [ResetCacheParameters](reset_cache_parameters.html)
